medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 day ago with crampy abdominal pain, primarily in the lower abdomen, and some upper abdominal cramping. Patient was able to sleep but woke up this morning with worsening lower abdominal cramping. Vomiting occurred every 20 minutes without nausea. Appetite has been absent since the onset of pain; no factors improved or worsened the pain.
medical_history.social_history: Occasional alcohol consumption; last drink was the night prior to admission.
